Quickstrike:






Quickstrike paused, looking up and down the hallway. "Slag, where'd she go?" 
He groan, with the pain in his leg hitting back. He limped back to the CR 
room. He glared at the remains of the explosion and to Sinesis. "Sinesis, 
put the rest of th' fire out." he commanded. "That other chamber still 
work?"
